text: Arra koso wa, maruyamu no ko masu~ifudearu.' To iu mono wa, tashikani fushinjin-shadearu. Itte yaru ga i. `Dare ga arra ni taishi, sukoshidemo-ryoku ga arou ka. Moshi kare ga maruyamu no ko masu~ifu, sono haha to chijo no subete no mono o horobosou to o kangae ni nara retara, dare ga seishi dekiyou.' Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida no subete no mono wa, arra no taiken ni zokusuru. Kare wa o kangae ni nara reta mono o sozo nasa reru. Arra â€• wa subete no koto ni zen'no de ara reru
